HP.note: HP Flask. Triggers when life is at or below 80%. Uses key '1'. After pressing, waits 0.5s before checking again. Cooldown 2.8s (matches flask recovery duration).

MP.note: Mana Flask. Triggers when mana is at or below 20%. Uses key '2'. After pressing, waits 0.3s before checking again. Cooldown 3.5s (matches flask recovery duration).

ES.note: ES Recovery Skill. Triggers when energy shield is at or below 30%. Uses key 'E'. No extra delay after pressing. Cooldown 23s (skill cooldown).
